item.title: Judge orders new trial for Alabama man who has been on death row for 31 years
item.description: A federal judge has ordered a new trial for an Alabama man on death row who argued that DNA evidence shows he's innocent

item.title: Robot rabbits in Florida battle to control invasive Burmese pythons in Everglades
item.description: They look, move and even smell like the kind of furry Everglades marsh rabbit a Burmese python would love to eat
